Title: Double-page Illuminated Frontispiece
Medium: ink and pigments on laid paper
Description: This is the right side of a double-page illuminated frontispiece from Walters manuscript W.602 that precedes the beginning of the main text of the Shahnamah (Book of kings).
Keywords: Islamic; Persian; Qajar; Book; Codex; Colophon; Illumination; Illustration; Manuscript; Iran; Afghanistan; History; Literature -- Poetry
Provenance: Henry Walters, Baltimore [date and mode of acquisition unknown]; Walters Art Museum, 1931, by bequest.
Creator: Firdawsi (Persian, died 411-416 AH/AD 1020-1025)
